# BadgeSwift version history

## 5.0.0 (2017-03-12)

* Make the BadgeSwift open, to allow subclassing.

## 4.0.0 (2016-10-11)

* Added ability to customize corner radius - [gperdomor](https://github.com/gperdomor).

## 3.0.0 (2016-08-13)

* Update to Xcode 8 beta 5.

## 2.0.7 (2016-06-21)

* Added tvOS support

## 2.0.4 (2016-06-21)

* Updated to Swift 3.0
